title: [Spoiler] Team Immunity vs Avant Garde / OPL 2015 Split 2 - W7D1 / Post-Match Discussion

replies.body: AV is crushing the IM in team fight, but regards secure the game object, IM beats  AV{{champion:79}}
i felt AV could of ended that game abit eariler

IM's early game tactic didn't work as they try to crush the AV's BOT lane with 4v2, but AV put Warble's Sivir to the toplane to farm freely, where Destiny's Morgana and Porky's Maokai to defends the IM's 4 player(no kill fed to IM at all). Due to that IM's snowball didn't start to roll in the early stage which delay all IM's players' gold and experience, hence lead to a mid game loss.

But I like IM's tactic (even I tipped AV's winning), it's more entertaining to watch a game with different strategy and different match ups, rather than the boring laneing match and wait for the opponent's mistake.

Completely agree.

on a sidenote tho im really liking destiny's supporting.
